panels.description: Number of registrations made in the last 12 months separated by origin (app, website) month by month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  	UNIX_TIMESTAMP(createdAt) as time_sec,
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%m') AS MonthNumber,
	SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) AS Month,
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') AS Year,
	CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3), '/' , DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y')) AS MonthYear,
	(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM purchases WHERE origin = 'app' AND SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) = Month AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') = Year) AS App,
	(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM purchases WHERE origin = 'website' AND SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) = Month AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') = Year) AS Website
FROM
	purchases 
WHERE
	origin IN('app', 'website') AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND NOW()
GROUP BY
	MonthNumber, Year, Month, MonthYear 
ORDER BY
	Year, MonthNumber, Month;

panels.title: Quantity of Enrollment (12 months) Month by Month - v1.0

panels.description: Number of registrations made in the last 12 months separated by origin (app, website) month by month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%m') AS MonthNumber,
	SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) AS Month,
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') AS Year,
	CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3), '/' , DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y')) AS MonthYear,
	(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM purchases WHERE origin = 'app' AND SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) = Month AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') = Year) AS App,
	(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM purchases WHERE origin = 'website' AND SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) = Month AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y') = Year) AS Website
FROM
	purchases 
WHERE
	origin IN('app', 'website') AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND NOW()
GROUP BY
	MonthNumber, Year, Month, MonthYear
ORDER BY
	Year, MonthNumber, Month;

panels.title: Quantity of Enrollment (12 months) Month by Month

panels.description: Percentage of purchases in the last 12 months (month to month)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%m') AS MonthNumber,
	SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) AS Month,
	DATE_FORMAT(createdAt , '%Y') AS Year,
	COUNT(id) AS Quantity,
	CONCAT(FORMAT(((COUNT(id) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases WHERE createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW()))) * 100), 2), '%') AS Percentage
FROM 
	purchases
WHERE 
	createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())
GROUP BY
	MonthNumber, Year, Month
ORDER BY 
	Year, MonthNumber;

panels.title: Percentage of Purchases (12 months)

panels.description: Average purchases for the last 12 months

targets.rawSql:
SELECT _Average_ FROM(
	SELECT
		(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases WHERE createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) AS _Total_,
		SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) AS _Month_,
		DATE_FORMAT(createdAt , '%Y') AS _Year_,
		COUNT(id) AS _Quantity_,
		FORMAT((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases WHERE createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) / (SELECT COUNT(_COUNTER_) FROM (
			SELECT COUNT(*) AS _COUNTER_, SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%M'), 1, 3) AS _M_ FROM purchases WHERE createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW()) GROUP BY _M_
		) AS _VIRTUAL_), 0) AS _Average_
	FROM 
		purchases
	WHERE 
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())
	GROUP BY
		_Month_, _Year_
) AS _Average_Calc_
GROUP BY _Average_;

panels.title: Average of Purchases (12 months)

panels.description: Number of purchases made through the APP

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total, now() AS time  FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'app';

panels.description: Number of purchases made through the Website

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total, now() AS time  FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'website';

panels.title: Quantity of Sales Products By Website

panels.description: Number of products sold (12 months)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  NOW() AS time,
	SUM(quantity) AS TOTAL
FROM
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW());

panels.title: Quantity of Sales Products (12 months)

panels.description: Number of registrations without purchases

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() AS time,
	COUNT(u.id) as TOTAL
FROM
	users u
WHERE
	u.id NOT IN (SELECT user_id  FROM purchases);

panels.title: Quantity of users without purchases

panels.description: Quantity of purchases made through the App vs. Website

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	COUNT(*) AS Total,
	(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'app') AS App,
	(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'website') AS Website
FROM 
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Quantity of Purchases App x Website

panels.description: Percentage of purchases made through the App vs. Website

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	FORMAT((((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'app') / COUNT(*)) * 100), 0) AS App,
	FORMAT((((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'website') / COUNT(*)) * 100), 0) AS Website
FROM 
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Percentage of Purchases App x Website

panels.description: Quantity of purchases made through the App vs. Website in the last 12 months

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	COUNT(*) AS Total,
	(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'app' AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) AS App,
	(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'website' AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) AS Website
FROM 
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW());

panels.title: Quantity of Purchases App x Website (12 months)

panels.description: Percentage of purchases made through the App vs. Website in the last 12 months

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	FORMAT((((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'app' AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) / COUNT(*)) * 100), 0) AS App,
	FORMAT((((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases p WHERE origin = 'website' AND createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())) / COUNT(*)) * 100), 0) AS Website
FROM 
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW());

panels.title: Percentage of Purchases App x Website (12 months)

panels.description: Number of purchases canceled in the last 3 years (accounted for by year: year1=200, year2=100, year3=500)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (NOW()) as time,
	COUNT(*) AS TOTAL,
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 3 YEAR)) AND ((NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR))
		AND deletedAt IS NOT NULL
	) AS '2020',
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)) AND ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
		AND deletedAt IS NOT NULL
	) AS '2021',
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())
		AND deletedAt IS NOT NULL
	) AS '2022'
FROM
	purchases
WHERE
	deletedAt IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Purchases Canceled (last 3 years)

panels.description: Quantity of purchases in the grand total

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Purchases, now() as time FROM users;

panels.title: Total Purchases

panels.description: Number of purchases in the last 12 months

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	COUNT(*) AS Purchases, 
	(NOW()) as time,
	(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS _FROM_,
	(NOW()) as _TO_
FROM 
	purchases 
WHERE
	createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW());

panels.title: Total Purchases (12 months)

panels.description: Number of purchases in the last 3 years (accounted for by year: year1=200, year2=100, year3=500)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	(NOW()) as time,
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 3 YEAR)) AND ((NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR))
	) AS 'YEAR1',
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)) AND ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
	) AS 'YEAR2',
	(
	SELECT 
		COUNT(*)
	FROM 
		purchases 
	WHERE
		createdAt BETWEEN ((NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND (NOW())
	) AS 'YEAR3'
FROM
	purchases
WHERE
	createdAt IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Total Purchases (last 3 years)
